/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings, adding depth and complexity to the image. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting both the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
